mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no taskNo , t.task_title taskTitle , t.task_point taskPoint , DATE_FORMAT(t.task_deadline, '%m/%d') taskDeadline , t.tasklist_no tasklistNo , t.task_upper_no taskUpperNo , tl.project_no projectNo FROM task t INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE tl.project_no = #{projectNo}
